overview: The American rock band, Journey performs in Manila, Philippines with their new lead singer, Arnel Pineda. Features tracks from throughout the band's career including songs from their top selling 2008 'Revelation' album. Tracks include: Only the Young, Wheel in the Sky, Open Arms, Separate Ways, Don't Stop Believin', Any Way You Want It, Be Good To Yourself, Faithfully, Escape, Lovin' Touchin' Squeezin'
title: Journey: Live in Manila
